verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> of man ח֥וּד <S%H2330><s%> put forth חִידָ֖ה <S%H2420><s%> a riddle וּמְשֹׁ֣ל <S%H4911><s%> and speak מָשָׁ֑ל <S%H4912><s%> a parable אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <S%H559><s%> And say כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הַנֶּ֤שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> eagle הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> A great גְּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with great הַכְּנָפַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3671><s%> wings אֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H750><s%> long הָאֵ֔בֶר <S%H83><s%> pinions מָלֵא֙ <S%H4392><s%> full הַנּוֹצָ֔ה <S%H5133><s%> of feathers אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֖וֹ הָֽרִקְמָ֑ה <S%H7553><s%> which had divers colours בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> unto Lebanon וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַמֶּ֥רֶת <S%H6788><s%> the highest branch הָאָֽרֶז׃ <S%H730><s%> of the cedar

אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the top יְנִֽיקוֹתָ֖יו <S%H3242><s%> of his young twigs קָטָ֑ף <S%H6998><s%> He cropped off וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and carried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it into a land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of traffick בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> it in a city רֹכְלִ֖ים <S%H7402><s%> of merchants שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <S%H7760><s%> he set

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> He took מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> also of the seed הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and planted בִּשְׂדֵה־ <S%H7704><s%> field זָ֑רַע <S%H2233><s%> it in a fruitful קָ֚ח <S%H3947><s%> he placed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> [it] by great צַפְצָפָ֖ה <S%H6851><s%> it [as] a willow tree שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <S%H7760><s%> [and] set

וַיִּצְמַ֡ח <S%H6779><s%> And it grew וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> and became לְגֶ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine סֹרַ֜חַת <S%H5628><s%> and became a spreading שִׁפְלַ֣ת <S%H8217><s%> of low קוֹמָ֗ה <S%H6967><s%> stature לִפְנ֤וֹת <S%H6437><s%> turned דָּלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <S%H1808><s%> whose branches אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> toward וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <S%H8328><s%> toward him and the roots תַּחְתָּ֣יו <S%H8478><s%> under יִֽהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> remained וַתְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> became לְגֶ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> thereof were under him so it became a vine וַתַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and brought forth בַּדִּ֔ים <S%H905><s%> branches וַתְּשַׁלַּ֖ח <S%H7971><s%> and shot פֹּארֽוֹת׃ <S%H6288><s%> forth sprigs

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become נֶֽשֶׁר־ <S%H5404><s%> eagle אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> There was also another גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great גְּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with great כְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> wings וְרַב־ <S%H7227><s%> and many נוֹצָ֑ה <S%H5133><s%> feathers וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַגֶּ֨פֶן <S%H1612><s%> and behold this vine הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כָּֽפְנָ֧ה <S%H3719><s%> did bend שָׁרֳשֶׁ֣יהָ <S%H8328><s%> her roots עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> toward וְדָֽלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <S%H1808><s%> her branches שִׁלְחָה־ <S%H7971><s%> toward him and shot forth לּ֔וֹ לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <S%H8248><s%> toward him that he might water אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> מֵעֲרֻג֖וֹת <S%H6170><s%> it by the furrows מַטָּעָֽהּ׃ <S%H4302><s%> of her plantation

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> beside שָׂ֥דֶה <S%H7704><s%> soil טּ֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> in a good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> beside מַ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> by great הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> it was שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <S%H8362><s%> It was planted לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that it might bring forth עָנָף֙ <S%H6057><s%> branches וְלָשֵׂ֣את <S%H5375><s%> and that it might bear פֶּ֔רִי <S%H6529><s%> fruit לִהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לְגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> vine אַדָּֽרֶת׃ <S%H155><s%> that it might be a goodly ס

אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD תִּצְלָ֑ח <S%H6743><s%> Shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> nor אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁרָשֶׁ֨יהָ <S%H8328><s%> the roots יְנַתֵּ֜ק <S%H5423><s%> ? shall he not pull up וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְיָ֣הּ ׀ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit יְקוֹסֵ֣ס <S%H7082><s%> thereof and cut off וְיָבֵ֗שׁ <S%H3001><s%> thereof that it wither כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner טַרְפֵּ֤י <S%H2964><s%> in all the leaves צִמְחָהּ֙ <S%H6780><s%> of her spring תִּיבָ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ? it shall wither וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor בִזְרֹ֤עַ <S%H2220><s%> power גְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> even without great וּבְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> or many לְמַשְׂא֥וֹת <S%H5375><s%> to pluck it up אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> מִשָּׁרָשֶֽׁיהָ׃ <S%H8328><s%> by the roots

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שְׁתוּלָ֖ה <S%H8362><s%> Yea behold [being] planted הֲתִצְלָ֑ח <S%H6743><s%> shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not כְגַ֨עַת <S%H5060><s%> toucheth בָּ֜הּ ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind הַקָּדִים֙ <S%H6921><s%> when the east תִּיבַ֣שׁ <S%H3001><s%> ? shall it not utterly יָבֹ֔שׁ <S%H3001><s%> wither עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on עֲרֻגֹ֥ת <S%H6170><s%> in the furrows צִמְחָ֖הּ <S%H6780><s%> where it grew תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> it? it shall wither פ
וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> came unto me saying

אֱמָר־ <S%H559><s%> Say נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֔רִי <S%H4805><s%> now to the rebellious הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> Know מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֱמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> ye not what these [things mean]? tell הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָ֨א <S%H935><s%> is come מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> [them] Behold the king בָּבֶ֤ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and hath taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּהּ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֶ֔יהָ <S%H8269><s%> thereof and the princes וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> thereof and led אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> them with him to Babylon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And hath taken מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> seed הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <S%H4410><s%> of the king's וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> and made אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> a covenant וַיָּבֵ֤א <S%H935><s%> with him and hath taken אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּאָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> an oath וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵילֵ֥י <S%H352><s%> the mighty הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לָקָֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> of him he hath also taken

לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מַמְלָכָ֣ה <S%H4467><s%> That the kingdom שְׁפָלָ֔ה <S%H8217><s%> might be base לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not הִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> that it might not lift itself up לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> [but] that by keeping אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִית֖וֹ <S%H1285><s%> of his covenant לְעָמְדָֽהּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> it might stand

וַיִּמְרָד־ <S%H4775><s%> But he rebelled בּ֗וֹ לִשְׁלֹ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> against him in sending מַלְאָכָיו֙ <S%H4397><s%> his ambassadors מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> that they might give ל֥וֹ סוּסִ֖ים <S%H5483><s%> him horses וְעַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> and much הֲיִצְלָ֤ח <S%H6743><s%> Shall he prosper הֲיִמָּלֵט֙ <S%H4422><s%> ? shall he escape הָעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that doeth אֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such וְהֵפֵ֥ר <S%H6565><s%> such [things]? or shall he break בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant וְנִמְלָֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> and be delivered

חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not בִּמְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> surely in the place הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> [where] the king הַמַּמְלִ֣יךְ <S%H4427><s%> [dwelleth] that made him king אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whose בָּזָה֙ <S%H959><s%> he despised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָ֣לָת֔וֹ <S%H423><s%> whose oath וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and whose הֵפֵ֖ר <S%H6565><s%> he brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִית֑וֹ <S%H1285><s%> and whose covenant אִתּ֥וֹ <S%H854><s%> in בְתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> [even] with him in the midst בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he shall die

וְלֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> not בְחַ֨יִל <S%H2428><s%> army גָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with [his] mighty וּבְקָהָ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> company רָ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> and great יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> make אוֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> Neither shall Pharaoh בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> for him in the war בִּשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <S%H8210><s%> by casting up סֹלְלָ֖ה <S%H5550><s%> mounts וּבִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> and building דָּיֵ֑ק <S%H1785><s%> forts לְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off נְפָשׁ֥וֹת <S%H5315><s%> persons רַבּֽוֹת׃ <S%H7227><s%> many

וּבָזָ֥ה <S%H959><s%> Seeing he despised אָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> the oath לְהָפֵ֣ר <S%H6565><s%> by breaking בְּרִ֑ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> when lo he had given יָד֛וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and hath done לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> all these [things] he shall not escape ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֮ <S%H3069><s%> GOD חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> [As] I live אָנִי֒ <S%H589><s%> I אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not אָֽלָתִי֙ <S%H423><s%> surely mine oath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּזָ֔ה <S%H959><s%> that he hath despised וּבְרִיתִ֖י <S%H1285><s%> and my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵפִ֑יר <S%H6331><s%> that he hath broken וּנְתַתִּ֖יו <S%H5414><s%> even it will I recompense בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> upon his own head

וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <S%H6566><s%> And I will spread עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> over רִשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H7568><s%> my net וְנִתְפַּ֖שׂ <S%H8610><s%> upon him and he shall be taken בִּמְצֽוּדָתִ֑י <S%H4686><s%> in my snare וַהֲבִיאוֹתִ֣יהוּ <S%H935><s%> and I will bring בָבֶ֗לָה <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֤י <S%H8199><s%> and will plead אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there מַעֲל֖וֹ <S%H4603><s%> with him there for his trespass אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מָֽעַל־ <S%H4604><s%> that he hath trespassed בִּֽי׃

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All [מִבְרָחֹו כ] (מִבְרָחָ֤יו <S%H4015><s%> fugitive ק) בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲגַפָּיו֙ <S%H102><s%> with all his bands בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> and they that remain לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> toward all winds יִפָּרֵ֑שׂוּ <S%H6566><s%> shall be scattered וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <S%H3045><s%> and ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken ס
